attributes.action: Review parliament's decision regarding the banning of Donald Trump from the UK.
attributes.additional_details: Many other hate preachers have been excluded; why should Donald Trump be any different, especially considering his high influence?
attributes.background: Donald Trump's newfound presidency should not be allowed to cloud our judgement regarding his Islamiphobic, misogynistic, and hateful attitudes: he ought to be banned from the UK, lest he should begin to incite hate crime here, as well as in the USA.
